metadata.title: CVE-2021-35331 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In Tcl 8.6.11, a format string vulnerability in nmakehlp.cmight allow code execution via a crafted file. NOTE: multiple third partiesdispute the significance of this finding.

criterions.comment: tcl8.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
